data.title: Film Loans from the Library of Congress — September 2022
data.meta_description: Here are some of the titles from the Library’s motion picture collections–many preserved by the NAVCC film laboratory–that we’re loaning for exhibition this month. As always, we can’t guarantee that schedules won’t change or links get broken, but this is our best information at the time of publication. Academy Museum of Motion Pictures     Los …
data.text:
Here are some of the titles from the Library’s motion picture collections–many preserved by the NAVCC film laboratory–that we’re loaning for exhibition this month. As always, we can’t guarantee that schedules won’t change or links get broken, but this is our best information at the time of publication.

Academy Museum of Motion Pictures Los Angeles, California

DARK MANHATTAN (1937) DCP September 1

https://www.academymuseum.org/en/programs/detail/dark-manhattan-with-murder-in-harlem-0181269b-be3c-db2d-bfdb-8b51cec97b7d

NATIVE SON (1951) 35mm print September 9

https://www.academymuseum.org/en/programs/detail/no-way-out-with-native-son-0181269d-e328-b2f5-e9b1-4ac2f521c93f

NOTHING BUT A MAN (1964) 35mm print September 24

https://www.academymuseum.org/en/programs/detail/la-permission-the-story-of-a-three-day-pass-with-nothing-but-a-man-0181269f-c7b4-27a7-a662-179edd54e62e

Stanford Theatre Palo Alto, California

THE GENERAL (1926) 35mm print September 2

https://stanfordtheatre.org/calendars/Summer%202022.html

Cinecon 58 Los Angeles, California

https://cinecon.org/schedule/

THE FLAMING FOREST (1926) 35mm print September 3

A TEMPERAMENTAL WIFE (1919) DCP September 4

FOOL’S PARADISE (1921) DCP September 4

CHANGING HUSBANDS (1924) 35mm print September 5

LOVE NEVER DIES (1921) 35mm print September 7 and 20

THE PATSY (1928) 35mm print September 10

SHOW PEOPLE (1928) 35mm print September 10 and 21

THE JACK-KNIFE MAN (1920) 35mm print September 16 and 24

Garden State Theatre Organ Society at the Union County Performing Arts Center Rahway, New Jersey
